email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. I’ve been developing a community sports program aimed at engaging local youth in a variety of athletic activities that promote teamwork, discipline, and healthy lifestyles. Given the Active Youth Foundation’s mission and impressive track record, I believe a partnership could greatly amplify the reach and impact of this initiative.

Program Highlights:
• Weekly multi-sport clinics led by certified coaches and volunteers
• Emphasis on accessible training, mentorship, and life-skills workshops
• Collaboration with local schools and sports clubs for facilities and participant outreach

I’d love to explore how AYF could be involved—whether through coaching support, equipment grants, or co-hosting events—and to hear your ideas on how we can align the program with your current initiatives.

Would you be available sometime next week for a brief call or meeting? Please let me know what works best for you.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
John
Athletic Coach
[phone]
[email]
